list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor: Remove unused DOM manipulation and event logic
Simplified index.js by commenting lazy js code event handler

list.name: Changes by Xits
list.comment:
Enhance header styling and adjust animations.
Replaced solid header background with a gradient for improved visuals. Tweaked animation duration and keyframe timing for smoother effects. Minor CSS adjustments include margin refinement for `.title` and code cleanup.

task.summary: Default task

Add CoffeeCupBot with Telegram and web-based ordering system
Implemented a Telegram bot for user registration and food ordering. Added a web interface for food item selection, order summary, and placing orders. Included assets like images, styles, and JavaScript for a fully functional front-end experience.

Add web app integration and GitLab CI configuration
Added a WebApp button in the Telegram bot linking to a hosted web interface for orders. Introduced a `.gitlab-ci.yml` file for automated GitLab Pages deployment. Optimized project configurations in `workspace.xml`.

Add web app integration and GitLab CI configuration
Added a WebApp button in the Telegram bot linking to a hosted web interface for orders. Introduced a `.gitlab-ci.yml` file for automated GitLab Pages deployment. Optimized project configurations in `workspace.xml`.

Add web app integration and GitLab CI configuration
Added a WebApp button in the Telegram bot linking to a hosted web interface for orders. Introduced a `.gitlab-ci.yml` file for automated GitLab Pages deployment. Optimized project configurations in `workspace.xml`.

Update script sources in index.html
Corrected the Telegram Web App script URL to the official domain for reliability. Moved the local script inclusion to the head for consistent loading behavior.

Update script include with version query parameter
Moved the JavaScript file inclusion to the end of the body and added a version query parameter for cache busting. Improves page load performance and ensures the latest script updates are reflected.

Update order handling logic and streamline Telegram bot integration
Refactored the backend and frontend to enhance order processing. The backend now decodes and formats received JSON to notify the admin (CHIEF_ID) and provides user feedback. The frontend sends structured order data to the Telegram bot using `Telegram.WebApp.sendData` for improved communication.

Update order handling logic and streamline Telegram bot integration
Refactored the backend and frontend to enhance order processing. The backend now decodes and formats received JSON to notify the admin (CHIEF_ID) and provides user feedback. The frontend sends structured order data to the Telegram bot using `Telegram.WebApp.sendData` for improved communication.

Use alerts instead of console logs for Telegram WebApp check.
Replaced `console.log` statements with `alert` to provide more visible feedback to users whether the page is opened as a Telegram WebApp or not. This ensures the message is prominently displayed.

Add alerts for Telegram WebApp page detection
Alerts now notify users whether the page is opened as a Telegram WebApp or not. Removed redundant event listener to consolidate logic within the order button's event handler.

Add alerts for Telegram WebApp page detection
Alerts now notify users whether the page is opened as a Telegram WebApp or not. Removed redundant event listener to consolidate logic within the order button's event handler.

Add alerts for Telegram WebApp page detection
Alerts now notify users whether the page is opened as a Telegram WebApp or not. Removed redundant event listener to consolidate logic within the order button's event handler.

Refactor shop UI and implement lazy loading for images
Refactored JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to streamline the shop UI and improve performance. Added lazy loading for images using IntersectionObserver for better efficiency. Enhanced styles, improved event handling with delegation, and integrated Telegram WebApp API for order functionality.

Add new TopLogoM3 image asset
Introduce a new image asset, `TopLogoM3`, for use in the application. This addition is intended to support updates to the UI design.

Update logo image source in index.html
Corrected the image source for the logo to fix a broken link. This ensures the logo displays properly on the website.

Adjust styles and add glow effect to the order button
Updated CSS to enhance the UI with more consistent margins, lighter font weight, and a pseudo-element glow effect for the order button. Added `-webkit-tap-highlight-color` to improve touch interactions on buttons. Introduced a keyframe animation for a dynamic left-to-right glow effect.

Update default total price display in order button
Changed the displayed default total price from "111 000 som" to "0 som" in the footer's order button. This ensures a more accurate initial state before any user interaction.

Update menu structure and fix layout issues in UI
Updated section titles to better reflect menu categories and added new sections such as Bakery and Garniers. Fixed the logo path and adjusted layout spacing for better alignment in the header. Updated placeholder values like the total price in the footer for a more realistic display.

Update logo image source in index.html
Replaced the logo image with a corrected file path to ensure the logo displays correctly. This fixes a potential issue with the previous file reference.

Enhance header styling and adjust animations.
Replaced solid header background with a gradient for improved visuals. Tweaked animation duration and keyframe timing for smoother effects. Minor CSS adjustments include margin refinement for `.title` and code cleanup.

Simplify CSS styling and adjust food card layout.
Removed unnecessary code comments and unused styles for better maintainability. Updated food card image dimensions and added spacing adjustment to the grid for improved visual balance.

Add new food menu items and lazy loading for images
The update introduces various new menu items under multiple categories, including salads, hot meals, bakery, and garnishes. It also adds lazy loading to all food item images for improved page performance and user experience.

Refactor: Remove unused DOM manipulation and event logic
Simplified index.js by commenting lazy js code event handler

Simplified index.js by commenting lazy js code event handler

MESSAGE.value:
Add CoffeeCupBot with Telegram and web-based ordering system
Implemented a Telegram bot for user registration and food ordering. Added a web interface for food item selection, order summary, and placing orders. Included assets like images, styles, and JavaScript for a fully functional front-end experience.

Add web app integration and GitLab CI configuration
Added a WebApp button in the Telegram bot linking to a hosted web interface for orders. Introduced a `.gitlab-ci.yml` file for automated GitLab Pages deployment. Optimized project configurations in `workspace.xml`.

Update script sources in index.html
Corrected the Telegram Web App script URL to the official domain for reliability. Moved the local script inclusion to the head for consistent loading behavior.

Update script include with version query parameter
Moved the JavaScript file inclusion to the end of the body and added a version query parameter for cache busting. Improves page load performance and ensures the latest script updates are reflected.

Update order handling logic and streamline Telegram bot integration
Refactored the backend and frontend to enhance order processing. The backend now decodes and formats received JSON to notify the admin (CHIEF_ID) and provides user feedback. The frontend sends structured order data to the Telegram bot using `Telegram.WebApp.sendData` for improved communication.

Use alerts instead of console logs for Telegram WebApp check.
Replaced `console.log` statements with `alert` to provide more visible feedback to users whether the page is opened as a Telegram WebApp or not. This ensures the message is prominently displayed.
Changes by Xits

Add alerts for Telegram WebApp page detection
Alerts now notify users whether the page is opened as a Telegram WebApp or not. Removed redundant event listener to consolidate logic within the order button's event handler.

Add new TopLogoM3 image asset
Introduce a new image asset, `TopLogoM3`, for use in the application. This addition is intended to support updates to the UI design.

Update logo image source in index.html
Corrected the image source for the logo to fix a broken link. This ensures the logo displays properly on the website.

Refactor shop UI and implement lazy loading for images
Refactored JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to streamline the shop UI and improve performance. Added lazy loading for images using IntersectionObserver for better efficiency. Enhanced styles, improved event handling with delegation, and integrated Telegram WebApp API for order functionality.

Implement dynamic button glow effect and minor UI tweaks
Added a glowing animation effect to the footer order button for better user engagement. Adjusted text alignment, padding, and weights in the layout for improved UI consistency. Cleaned up unnecessary spacing in the CSS file.

Adjust styles and add glow effect to the order button
Updated CSS to enhance the UI with more consistent margins, lighter font weight, and a pseudo-element glow effect for the order button. Added `-webkit-tap-highlight-color` to improve touch interactions on buttons. Introduced a keyframe animation for a dynamic left-to-right glow effect.

Update default total price display in order button
Changed the displayed default total price from "111 000 som" to "0 som" in the footer's order button. This ensures a more accurate initial state before any user interaction.

Update menu structure and fix layout issues in UI
Updated section titles to better reflect menu categories and added new sections such as Bakery and Garniers. Fixed the logo path and adjusted layout spacing for better alignment in the header. Updated placeholder values like the total price in the footer for a more realistic display.

Enhance header styling and adjust animations.
Replaced solid header background with a gradient for improved visuals. Tweaked animation duration and keyframe timing for smoother effects. Minor CSS adjustments include margin refinement for `.title` and code cleanup.

Update logo image source in index.html
Replaced the logo image with a corrected file path to ensure the logo displays correctly. This fixes a potential issue with the previous file reference.

Add lazy loading for food images and expand menu categories
Implemented lazy loading for images in the food grid to optimize performance. Updated the menu with new food categories like salads, hot meals, and bakery, along with additional item cards. Enhanced layout by improving section titles and adding support for Google Fonts.

Simplify CSS styling and adjust food card layout.
Removed unnecessary code comments and unused styles for better maintainability. Updated food card image dimensions and added spacing adjustment to the grid for improved visual balance.

Add new food menu items and lazy loading for images
The update introduces various new menu items under multiple categories, including salads, hot meals, bakery, and garnishes. It also adds lazy loading to all food item images for improved page performance and user experience.
